mapper.select: SELECT TM.TOGMEM_ID AS togetherMemberId, TM.TOG_ID AS togetherId, TM.USER_ID AS userId, TM.IS_HOST AS isHost, U.NAME AS "user.name", U.SEX AS "user.sex" FROM TOGETHER_MEMBER TM, USERINFO U WHERE TM.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND TOG_ID = #{togId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOGETHER_MEMBER (TOGMEM_ID, USER_ID, TOG_ID, IS_HOST) VALUES(TOGMEM_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{togetherId}, #{isHost})
